original_text: The next day was the Jewish day of rest. The leaders of the priests and the Pharisees met together with Pilate.
korean_text: 그 이튿날은 준비일 다음 날이라 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 함께 빌라도에게 모여 이르되

sentences.original_text: The next day was the Jewish day of rest.
The leaders of the priests and the Pharisees met together
